docs.title: CMM AI Automation Schema
docs.text:
Schema for Critical Mineral Metabolism (CMM) data curation.

Models microbial strains, growth media, ingredients, and their relationships for knowledge graph generation.

URI: https://w3id.org/turbomam/cmm-ai-automation

Name: cmm-ai-automation

docs.title: Classes
docs.text: Class Description CMMDatabase Container for all CMM entities CrossReference A cross-reference to an external database or identifier IngredientComponent Reified relationship: an ingredient as used in a mixture, with concentration ... NamedThing A generic grouping for any identifiable entity Ingredient A chemical entity that can be a component of solutions or media Mixture Abstract base class for things composed of ingredients GrowthMedium A complete formulation for cultivating microorganisms Solution A pre-made concentrated mixture of ingredients, typically diluted into media SolutionComponent Reified relationship: a solution as used in a medium, with volume/dilution

docs.title: Slots
docs.text: Slot Description cas_rn CAS Registry Number chebi_id ChEBI identifier chemical_formula Chemical formula (e concentration_unit Unit of concentration concentration_value Numeric concentration value description A human-readable description for a thing has_ingredient_component Ingredients contained in this mixture with their concentrations has_solution_component Solutions contained in this medium id A unique identifier for a thing inchikey InChIKey for structural identification ingredient Reference to the ingredient entity ingredients media medium_type Classification of the medium name A human-readable name for a thing notes Free-text notes about this component ph Target pH of the medium pubchem_cid PubChem Compound ID references Literature references for this medium formulation roles Functional roles of this ingredient in this specific mixture solution Reference to the solution entity solution_type Classification of the solution solutions sterilization_method How the medium is sterilized (e synonyms Alternative names for this entity target_organisms Taxa or organism types this medium is designed for volume_per_liter Volume of solution added per liter of medium volume_unit Unit of volume (typically mL) xref_id The identifier value xref_label Human-readable label from the external source xref_type Type of cross-reference (e xrefs Cross-references to external databases
